sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with feng zhen 風疹 , wind papules. Lei gong pao zhi lun 雷公炮炙論 Xu 序：遍體疹 風，冷調生側，附子傍生者曰側子，作末，冷酒服，立差也 , “If the entire body is affected by papules wind , process lateral [ fu zi 附子 ] with cold [wine]. {Those growing to the side of fu zi are called ci zi , (lit.: lateral [ fu ] zi )} Prepare a powder, and ingest with cold wine. Immediately effective”.
